text: Era'i -- edera jan'ya rayeche nandana kanana samuha, yadera nica diye baye cale jharanaraji, tadera sekhane alankrta karano habe sonara kamkana diye, ara tadera parano habe mihi resamera o puru jarira sabuja posake, sekhane samasina habe susajjita asane. Ki uttama puraskara, ara kata sundara bisramasthala
